text:
HowAboutWe: Brooklyn, NY www.howaboutwe.com

HowAboutWe helps people fall in love and stay in love. The company is comprised of three core products: HowAboutWe Dating, HowAboutWe for Couples and HowAboutWe Media.With more than 1.7 million users we are looking to expand our products. Therefore we need to expand the team as well.

If any of these open spots seem like something your interested in shoot an email with a resume to: nmorin@howaboutwe.com

Android Developer

Full Stack Ruby Engineer

iOS Developer

Senior DataScientist

All positions are in house. We are open to H1B.
